Photosynthesizing humans could potentially reduce the demand for agriculture, as they would be able to produce their own food through photosynthesis.
Photosynthesizing humans could lead to a shift in the way cities are designed, as buildings and infrastructure would need to be constructed with solar panels and green spaces in mind.
Photosynthesizing humans could lead to a new form of art, as people would be able to create and perform in a more sustainable and eco-friendly way.
Photosynthesizing humans could potentially lead to new forms of medicine, as the process of photosynthesis could be harnessed to produce drugs and treatments.
Photosynthesizing humans could lead to new forms of transportation, as people would be able to generate their own fuel through photosynthesis.
